Token.Abstract: TICDSSyncChangeSet objects are used to keep track of collections of TICDSSyncChange objects.
Create a sync change set in the given managed object context.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique identifier for the sync change.

Parameter.Name: aClientIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique identifier of the client device that generated this set of sync changes.

Parameter.Name: aDate
Parameter.Abstract: The original creation date of the sync change set.

Parameter.Name: aMoc
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context in which to create the sync change.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A suitably-configured TICDSSyncChange object for the given change.

Token.Abstract: Check whether a sync change set with a given identifier has already been applied in a managed object context.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique identifier for the sync change.

Parameter.Name: aMoc
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context to check.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Boolean indicating whether the sync change has already been applied.
